Author: ahsonwardak
Content: I think that the answer to the future of social networking websites is somewhere between the two you present.  It could still explore a million different niches, and Ning is enabling that (Think the long tail!).  On the other hand, social networks should begin to offer more than keeping track of friends, their lives, our own lives, and the overlapping areas like events and blog posts.

Author: rami
Title: Getting featured on a TV show helped way more than I expected
Content: Last week ScienceHack.com was featured on Canada AM. Canada AM is a morning show that airs across Canada on weekdays. I got a nice spike from Canada.
